___MaxJobs.description: The maximum number of concurrent jobs that can run the application

___MaxUserSeats.description: The maximum number of concurrent users that can run the application

___Description.description: A human-readable description of the application

___ApplicationHandleID.description: ID(s) of the ApplicationHandles that can be used to refer to this environment

___FreeUserSeats.description: The maximum number of additional users that can run the application

___ComputingManagerID.description: ID of the ComputingManager this ApplicationEnvironment is associated with

___FreeJobs.description: The maximum number of additional jobs that can run the application

___RemovalDate.description: The date/time after which the application may be removed - DateTime_t

___State.description: The current installation state of the application - AppEnvState_t

___FreeSlots.description: The maximum number slots currently available to run the application

___MaxSlots.description: The maximum number of concurrent slots that may be used to run the application

___BestBenchmark.description: The type(s) of the benchmarks which best describe the sensitivity of this application to the performance of the ExecutionEnvironment - Benchmark_t

___ParallelSupport.description: The type of supported parallel execution - ParallelSupport_t

___License.description: The license under which the application is usable - License_t

___ExecutionEnvironmentID.description: ID(s) of ExecutionEnvironments where this ApplicationEnvironment can be used
